# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I propose a special introductory price of $75 for you today. This is an exclusive offer tailored for you, considering your interest and potential long-term partnership with us. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the full benefits of our product at a discounted rate. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
